hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: PKG_VERSION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The version of Perl to build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PKG_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the download tarball and source directory

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!C:\MinGW\msys\1.0\bin\bash.exe --rcfile '/p/bashrc.jenkins' echo "==== Updating 'jenkins-config.git' repo ====" cd $JENKINS_HOME/src/jenkins-config.git git pull exit 0

#!C:\MinGW\msys\1.0\bin\bash.exe --rcfile '/p/bashrc.jenkins' echo "==== Downloading Perl ${PKG_VERSION} ====" if [ ! -f ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz ]; then wget -O ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz \ http://www.cpan.org/src/5.0/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz else echo "-- Perl ${PKG_VERSION} already downloaded successfully --" fi
exit 0

#!C:\MinGW\msys\1.0\bin\bash.exe --rcfile '/p/bashrc.jenkins' # always unpack fresh source echo "==== Checking for existing Perl ${PKG_VERSION} ====" if [ -d "${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}" ]; then echo "-- Deleting existing source tree for '${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}'; --" /bin/rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} else echo "-- No Perl tarball currently unpacked in ${WORKSPACE} --" fi

#!C:\MinGW\msys\1.0\bin\bash.exe --rcfile '/p/bashrc.jenkins' if [ -d ${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} ]; then cd ${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}
# now run Configure echo "==== Running 'Configure'; current directory is: $(pwd) ====" # -de = use defaults, go on without questions # there's a test in Configure for which file descriptor is connected # to Configure, the wrong file descriptor exits Configure C:/MinGW/msys/1.0/bin/bash --rcfile '/p/bashrc.jenkins' \ Configure -de \ -Dprefix="${WORKSPACE}/output" \ -Dusethreads \ -Duserelocatableinc else echo "${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} not found :(" fi
